verses.verse: <S%H559>Say<s%> to your <S%H251>brothers,<s%> <S%H5971>"Ammi,<s%>" and to your <S%H269>sisters,<s%> <S%H7355>"Ruhamah.<s%>"

<S%H7378>"Contend<s%> with your <S%H517>mother,<s%> <S%H7378>contend,<s%> For she is not my <S%H802>wife,<s%> and I am not her <S%H376>husband;<s%> And let her <S%H5493>put<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> her <S%H2183>harlotry<s%> from her <S%H6440>face,<s%> And her <S%H5005>adultery<s%> from <S%H996>between<s%> her <S%H7699>breasts,<s%>

<S%H6435>Lest<s%> I <S%H6584>strip<s%> her <S%H6174>naked<s%> And <S%H3322>expose<s%> her as on the <S%H3117>day<s%> when she was <S%H3205>born.<s%> I will also <S%H7760>make<s%> her like a <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> <S%H7896>Make<s%> her like <S%H6723>desert<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> And <S%H4191>slay<s%> her with <S%H6772>thirst.<s%>
"Also, I will <S%H7355>have<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7355>compassion<s%> on her <S%H1121>children,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> they are <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2183>harlotry.<s%>

"For their <S%H517>mother<s%> has <S%H2181>played<s%> the <S%H2181>harlot;<s%> She who <S%H2029>conceived<s%> them has <S%H954>acted<s%> <S%H954>shamefully.<s%> For she <S%H559>said,<s%> 'I will <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> my <S%H157>lovers,<s%> Who <S%H5414>give<s%> [me] my <S%H3899>bread<s%> and my <S%H4325>water,<s%> My <S%H6785>wool<s%> and my <S%H6593>flax,<s%> my <S%H8081>oil<s%> and my <S%H8250>drink.<s%>'

<S%H3651>"Therefore,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I will <S%H7753>hedge<s%> up her <S%H1870>way<s%> with <S%H9359>thorns,<s%> And I will <S%H1443>build<s%> a <S%H1447>wall<s%> against her so that she <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H4672>find<s%> her <S%H9350>paths.<s%>

"And she will <S%H7291>pursue<s%> her <S%H157>lovers,<s%> but she will not <S%H5381>overtake<s%> them; And she will <S%H1245>seek<s%> them, but will not <S%H4672>find<s%> [them.] Then she will <S%H559>say,<s%> 'I will <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> to my <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H376>husband,<s%> For it was <S%H2896>better<s%> for me <S%H227>then<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H6258>now!<s%>'

"For she does not <S%H3045>know<s%> that it was I who <S%H5414>gave<s%> her the <S%H1715>grain,<s%> the <S%H8492>new<s%> <S%H8492>wine,<s%> and the <S%H3323>oil,<s%> And <S%H7235>lavished<s%> on her <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold,<s%> [Which] they <S%H6213>used<s%> for <S%H1168>Baal.<s%>

<S%H3651>"Therefore,<s%> I will <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> My <S%H1715>grain<s%> at harvest <S%H6256>time<s%> And My <S%H8492>new<s%> <S%H8492>wine<s%> in its <S%H4150>season.<s%> I will also <S%H5337>take<s%> <S%H5337>away<s%> My <S%H6785>wool<s%> and My <S%H6593>flax<s%> [Given] to <S%H3680>cover<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness.<s%>

"And <S%H6258>then<s%> I will <S%H1540>uncover<s%> her <S%H5040>lewdness<s%> In the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of her <S%H157>lovers,<s%> And <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> will <S%H5337>rescue<s%> her out of My <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

"I will also <S%H7673>put<s%> an <S%H7673>end<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H4885>gaiety,<s%> Her <S%H2282>feasts,<s%> her <S%H2320>new<s%> <S%H2320>moons,<s%> her <S%H7676>sabbaths,<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H4150>festal<s%> <S%H4150>assemblies.<s%>

"And I will <S%H8074>destroy<s%> her <S%H1612>vines<s%> and <S%H8384>fig<s%> <S%H8384>trees,<s%> Of <S%H834>which<s%> she <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1992>'These<s%> are my <S%H866>wages<s%> <S%H834>Which<s%> my <S%H157>lovers<s%> have <S%H5414>given<s%> me.' And I will <S%H7760>make<s%> them a <S%H9194>forest,<s%> And the <S%H9130>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> will <S%H398>devour<s%> them.

"And I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> her for the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H1168>Baals<s%> <S%H834>When<s%> she used to <S%H6999>offer<s%> <S%H6999>sacrifices<s%> to them And <S%H5710>adorn<s%> herself with her <S%H5141>earrings<s%> and <S%H2484>jewelry,<s%> And <S%H1980>follow<s%> <S%H310><s%> her <S%H157>lovers,<s%> so that she <S%H7911>forgot<s%> Me," <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
<S%H3651>"Therefore,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I will <S%H6601>allure<s%> her, <S%H1980>Bring<s%> her into the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> And <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H3820>kindly<s%> to her.

"Then I will <S%H5414>give<s%> her her <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> from <S%H8033>there,<s%> And the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H5911>Achor<s%> as a <S%H6607>door<s%> of <S%H8615>hope.<s%> And she will <S%H9420>sing<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> as in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of her <S%H5271>youth,<s%> As in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when she <S%H5927>came<s%> up from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

"And it will <S%H1961>come<s%> about in that <S%H3117>day,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "That you will <S%H7121>call<s%> Me <S%H376>Ishi<s%> And will <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> Me <S%H1180>Baali.<s%>

"For I will <S%H5493>remove<s%> the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1168>Baals<s%> from her <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> So that they will be <S%H2142>mentioned<s%> by their <S%H8034>names<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more.<s%>

"In that <S%H3117>day<s%> I will also <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> for them With the <S%H9130>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> The <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> And the <S%H7431>creeping<s%> <S%H7431>things<s%> of the <S%H127>ground.<s%> And I will <S%H7665>abolish<s%> the <S%H7198>bow,<s%> the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and <S%H4421>war<s%> from the <S%H776>land,<s%> And will make them <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H7901>down<s%> in <S%H983>safety.<s%>

"And I will <S%H781>betroth<s%> you to Me <S%H5769>forever;<s%> Yes, I will <S%H781>betroth<s%> you to Me in <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> and in <S%H4941>justice,<s%> In <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> and in <S%H7356>compassion,<s%>
And I will <S%H781>betroth<s%> you to Me in <S%H530>faithfulness.<s%> Then you will <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"And it will <S%H1961>come<s%> about in that <S%H3117>day<s%> that I will <S%H6030>respond,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> I will <S%H6030>respond<s%> to the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and they will <S%H6030>respond<s%> to the <S%H776>earth,<s%>

And the <S%H776>earth<s%> will <S%H6030>respond<s%> to the <S%H1715>grain,<s%> to the <S%H8492>new<s%> <S%H8492>wine,<s%> and to the <S%H3323>oil,<s%> And they will <S%H6030>respond<s%> to <S%H3157>Jezreel.<s%>

"And I will <S%H2232>sow<s%> her for Myself in the <S%H776>land.<s%> I will also <S%H7355>have<s%> <S%H7355>compassion<s%> on her who had not <S%H7355>obtained<s%> <S%H7355>compassion,<s%> And I will <S%H559>say<s%> to those who were not My <S%H5971>people,<s%> 'You are My <S%H5971>people!<s%>' And they will <S%H559>say,<s%> '[Thou art] my <S%H430>God!<s%>'"
